flawed_nl_solution:
He has to read 350 pages a week because 7 x 50 = <<7*50=350>>350
He has read 263 pages because 43+65+28+70+56 = <<43+65+28+70+56=263>>263
He has to read 87 pages on Saturday because 350-263 =<<350-263=87>>87

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 262, not 263. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
